version_description: "Forgot Password" function has been added for Pegasus Plus Members and various improvements have been made.

. All customers are able to gain FlyPoints by entering Pegasus Plus information.
. Select / Buy baggage is added.
. Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bugfixes are made.

* New features : Rent a Car and Hotel Reservation
* Menu improvement
* Campaigns
* Minor optimizations
Minor improvements.
Added Turkish Identity Number field for Turkish Citizens.
Bugfix & Minor improvements
Price freezing , Fast track features and minor improvements
Added App tutorial function and minor visual improvements.
Analytics enhancements and minor improvements
Added Refund & Reissue features. Added unlimited flight changes.
Minor bug fixes are made.
Credit card scan feature is added and minor bug fixes are made.
Bugfixes are made.

We updated our app with new features just for you
1) Don't miss the advantage! You can get a discount of up to 50% by choosing seat, baggage and meals together as a bundle in our mobile app too.
2) Access to your mobile barcode anytime! You can now access all your mobile barcodes whenever you like!
Minor bugfixes were made.

Highlights:

Want to book your flight with your Flight Points?
No worries! You can book your flights with your Flight Points now on our app. Additionally you can see your Flight Points under “My Profile” section. Book it all easily on your mobile!

A brand new home screen
We designed a brand-new home screen so you can easily manage your travel with us!
Minor bugfixes were made.

This is your captain speaking!
Before your flight, I would like to provide you some information about this update.
+We have bad news for iOS 8 users
In order to book a flight with our app, iOS 8 users need to update their operating system.
+We made improvements on our campaign screen
We have improved user experience on campaign screen so you can easily navigate and book cheap flight tickets.
+ We’d love to hear your feedback.
Please use “write to us” on the left menu to leave your comments and valuable feedbacks.
And please, enjoy your flight

This is your captain speaking!

+Pay with a tap via Masterpass
Now with Masterpass you can pay with a quick tap for your flight tickets. If you are not a masterpass user, save your credit card information and save time on your next purchase. .

+Various bug fixes

Dear guests, please enjoy your flight.
Various bug fixes

Dear passengers, this is your captain speaking.
You are about to download the latest version of Pegasus Airlines mobile app.
This version comes with several new features, enabling you to make your travels easier from start to finish.
First of the new features is the the visa reader, which enables you to not lose time by entering your information manually during check-in procedures. If you’re travelling to a location which requires a visa, you now can enter all your information via simply using your cell phone camera.
The other features of the app are exclusively for BolBol users.
By saving your passport information, you now can buy plane tickets faster and easier.
When you check-in, you can buy additional services like baggage, meal, seat with your BolPuan.
You can also benefit from current sales and promotions while buying tickets with your BolPoints.
If you have updated the app and started your BolBol membership, you are now ready for take-off.
We wish you a pleasant flight.
General bug fixes
Various bug fixes
General bug fixes

Turkey's Digital Airline Pegasus Launches Brand New Digital Features
Download-Explore!
With its fresh new design, easy ticketing steps and transformed points system BolBol, Pegasus just got even more digital!

Boarding pass problem fixed.
Various bug fixes have done.
Various bug fixes have done.

• My Trips feature has been fixed.
• Various bug fixes.

•TouchID &FaceID Login
•BolBol My Account Improvements
•Extra Services Improvements
•Various Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

Are you tired of getting the same gifts for holiday season?.
Pegasus Gift Card is available for you and your loved ones for a joyful travel experience.
Pegasus, Turkey’s Digital Airline
Various bug fixes and performance improvements

• Flight Status:
With redesigned Flight Status feature you can get all the information about your flight. You can track any flight you want.
• Passport/ ID Scan:
We wanted to make Check-in process easier and faster so we added Passport/ID scanner.
• Check-in in-app notifications:
If you have a flight open for check-in, a notification will appear on your app to remind you to Check-in
• Various bug fixes and performance improvements

- Push notification container:
You can’t miss any deal with notification container. You can manage your notifications and settings via notification container
- Additional Services with BolBol Points:
After you made your booking you can add extra services with your BolBol points.

Your captain speaking:
I would like to give you some information about our new features on Pegasus Mobile App. From now on, you will earn x2 BolPoints from your app purchases. For instance, we will add 2.000 BolPoints to your BolBol account if you purchase a ticket which costs you 1.000 TL.
Such a good deal, ha? :)
Now, download or update your Pegasus Mobile App, login to your BolBol account, earn and fly with BolPoints!
Have a nice flight! :)

Dear passengers, this is your captain speaking.
You are about to download the latest version of Pegasus Airlines mobile app.
This version comes with several new features, enabling you to make your travels easier from start to finish.
First of the new features is the the visa reader, which enables you to not lose time by entering your information manually during check-in procedures. If you’re travelling to a location which requires a visa, you now can enter all your information via simply using your cell phone camera.
The other features of the app are exclusively for BolBol users.
By saving your passport information, you now can buy plane tickets faster and easier.
When you check-in, you can buy additional services like baggage, meal, seat with your BolPuan.
You can also benefit from current sales and promotions while buying tickets with your BolPoints.
If you have updated the app and started your BolBol membership, you are now ready for take-off.
We wish you a pleasant flight.

Dear guests, this is your captain speaking.
In this new version of our Pegasus flight ticket app, a number of exciting updates are waiting for you. Before we take off, I’d like to inform you about those updates.
·Opportunity for winning twice as more BolPuan: When you buy your plane ticket via the flypgs.com website or the mobile app, you will win double the amount of BolPuan you would win from other procedures of buying tickets.
·Full return guarantee up to 24 hours: Let’s assume you have bought a plane ticket and your flight is more than 3 days away. If you have any change of plans within the 24 hours after buying your ticket, you may return it free of charge, for its full value.
·Fly&Watch on board entertainment system: While on the plane, you can connect to Fly&Watch with your smart phone, tablet or laptop and access a great variety of movies, travel guides, magazines, children’s section, games and more.
See you in new updates!
I wish you a very pleasant flight.

Dear guests, this is your captain speaking. In this new version of our Pegasus flight ticket app, couple updates waiting for you. Before we take off, I’d like to inform you about it.
· Earn Double BolPoints: Purchase your ticket via Pegasus Mobile App and earn double BolPoints.
· Free Cancellation within 24 hours: If there are more than 3 days left for the flight you have just purchased, you can cancel your flight within 24 hours and get full refund.
I wish you a pleasant flight.

Dear guests, this is your captain speaking.
We are proud to keep you informed of the new version of the Pegasus flight ticket app. Please fasten your seatbelts.
• Quick Action: With the new version you will be able to use the Quick Action feature. Thanks to this feature you will be able to use Flight Search, Check-in and Boarding Pass options from the Quick Action Menu.

• Exclusive Offers: In the Special Offers tab, you’ll find a new button to check the latest offers just exclusive for you.

• Share PNR: With the latest update, after buying your ticket, on success page you can share the PNR number.

• Add to calendar: With the newest Add to calendar feature, you can add your flight date and time to your calendar.

• Double BolPoints: When buying your ticket via the mobile app you will earn BolPoints twice as more.

• Full return guarantee up to 24 hours: After buying your ticket, in the next 24 hours you’ll have the opportunity to fully return your ticket. Free of charge and for its full price.

"I've made minor touch-ups to my app to provide you with a better experience."

"A little reminder! You can update my application immediately and be informed about my flight tickets 1 day in advance. Come on, update now. Don't get sad if you miss the campaigns, don't make me sad, either!"

Here is the 'Travel Assistant'
Now, under the menu section 'My Flights' you can access all details regarding your flight on one screen with the Travel Assistant and edit them easily.
Some of what you can do with the Travel Assistant on one screen:
•Ticket processes
•add seats, meals, luggage etc. to the flight
•Check-in
•show boarding pass
•follow the notifications regarding your flight
Update your app now and be the first to try the new features!

Dear passengers, this is your captain speaking.
I would like to tell you about the "calendar and graph" views we have introduced in this version.
You can now easily compare the best price options on different days using the calendar and graph views when purchasing flight tickets. A very useful feature, especially for those with flexible travel dates!
Simply update your application to start using this new feature, and find for yourself the most affordable ticket option.
We wish you a pleasant flight.
